text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GP63 Leopard-013 Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 6 GB i7-8750H  15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-bit. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the MSI GP63 Leopard-013 Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 6 GB i7-8750H  15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GP63 Leopard-013 Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 6 GB i7-8750H  15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-bit is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GP63 Leopard-013 Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 6 GB i7-8750H  15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-bit is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GP63 Leopard-013 Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 6 GB i7-8750H  15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-bit!
